Warehouse Management App

DESCRIPTION

The goal of this system is to create a prototype of a smart tool that can detect when a minor is in danger of being harassed over the internet. In such case the system should send a notification to the parent of the child, but it should also not invade in the privacy of the minor.

THE COLLABORATION

This project was my first experience of working with a separate team of designers and I really enjoyed it how the teams of developers and designers learned from each other and managed to create that beautiful and functional interface.
